name: Pintley
overview:
Pintley is an online beer community and mobile app for consumers and brewers.

Drinkers join Pintley to get personalized beer recommendations, win prizes, and connect with brewers. Our users are extremely active, and they generate tens of thousands of ratings and taste notes every day.

Brewers use Pintley Partners to optimize their marketing spends. By connecting with Pintleyâ€™s community to create word-of-mouth campaigns, brewers better attract qualified customers and convert them into loyal, raving fans. Our unique points system, contact tools, and analytics help brewers build lasting relationships with customers at a fraction of the cost of other marketing campaigns.
